Posts.Title: Pictures Please

Posts.Content: My friend Frances is going in today for a biopsy of calcification in her breast. She is having a real hard time. She knew Becky through me and is so afraid.
Posts.Title: Hi Girls, Needing your special prayers...

Posts.Content:
The doctor thinks everything is fine. She will get her pathology report today.
 
 
 
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: Update on Francis

Posts.Content: Call me please. I have lost your number.
Posts.Title: Sara Dearing

Posts.Content:
Thinking of you all tonight. 
We just finished a week of Bible School. It was delightfula and hard. Becky was the one who encouraged her church to start Bible School again. She had so enjoyed it as a child and wanted her children to have the same memories. Unfortunately, they weren't there this year. I think it is too hard for Mike to be with his church family because they are all such a part of Becky.
I sure miss that girl. It seems everywhere I go I am someplace we went together. But I always have happy thoughts. Because we had a party no matter where we were. That is what I miss. The good times. 
 Becky's church has taken me in as one of their own and that has helped. They really are a wonderful group of people. I know they have all known her all her life but they understand how I miss her as well.
I think of you all often and hope everyone is doing well. You are all always in my prayers.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
Posts.Title: Hi Ladies

Posts.Content:
Hi Jan,
I am a 7 year survivor this May. You have an adventure ahead. Try to stay positive. Keep people around you that make you smiile. Take a tape recorder or someone who can help hear all the info to drs appointments. It's hard to take it all in. 
Visit here as often as you need. These ladies are so knowledgeable and loving. And someone has been right where you are at anytime during this adventure.
Hugs,
Angela
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed

Posts.Content:
Thanks for all the beautiful cards. I have felt so loved this week. It has been a tough one. I keep wanting to call Becky and check on her. Instead I call Mike and check on him. They have had it rough too. Mike says nights are the hardest after he gets the kids to bed. He said this is the first time in his life that he isn't sharing a room. I spent the afternoon with Mike and the kids today. Amelia and Rachel had a great time playing. We sat in the sunroom and watched them play. Becky loved her sunroom.
My DH left on Thursday for a conference and will be gone for the week. I am not doing well with people leaving me, even by plane. 
he cards sure helped. You girls are the best.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
Posts.Title: Hi Girls,

Posts.Content:
Becky's visitation was from 2-7 today. She looked so beautiful. Sara Dearing joined me there after she left work. We talked and cried and hugged and felt you all around us. Sara did you all proud by the flowers sent. They were so very lovelly. It was so great to see her. We have vowed to stay in touch. Our ranks here in Louisville have been severly diminished.
Becky's family, friends and church have taken me as one of their own which helps the feeling of loneliness I have felt since Tuesday. But it will never go away. I have lost a part of my heart that became Becky's on our first trip to Cinci. Thanks MK for visiting your daughter. We might never have become so close if not for that trip.
Sorry Girls, I am rambling on. Just know you are all close to my heart tonight and will be again tomorrow.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
Posts.Title: Hi Ladies. Were your ears burning today?

Posts.Content:
Dear Ellen & Friends, 
I have sure felt that way lately. Helpless has been a key word for me. Becky's faith sustained her through many of the hard times I have tried to follow Becky's example. So far it has helped.
I love you all for all the beautiful memories. I haven't had a real chance to think about those wonderful times.
I Love you all,
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: Louisville visitors..memories

Posts.Content:
Thank you Sara. I came here this morning to give you all the details. But Sara has handled that beautifuly. Yes, Becky's Mom has alzheimers. Mike feels it would serve no purpose to tell her. She would be upset and then forget. Our concern is that she may remember later when she doesn't have family around. He will continue taking care of her. He told me that when his Mom passed away 12 year ago that Elouise became his Mom too.
Many of you knew that Mike has been off work for the last 6 months to be with Becky. He said it was the best thing he has ever done. He is taking the rest of the summer off to be with the kids. They are planning beach trips, Disney World and fishing at his Dad's lake house. Mike is a GREAT DAD !!!
Love & Hugs, 
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: Mighty Becky's Obit

Posts.Content:
Oh yes Becky would want you to be there for Jean. You have been here for us so many times. Becky doesn't need us anymore. She is rejoicing with no pain or discomfort today.
A part of my heart is with each and every one of you today. Everyone going through radiation, chemo, procedures, You are in my thoughts and prayers always but especially today when we have a special emisary to guide those special prayers.
Love to all,
Hugs, Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: PCE needed for Jean!

Posts.Content:
Sara,
You did a great job, Girl. I loved having you and all the girls by my side yesterday. I don't know if I would have made it without you all. You know this is where Becky and I met, amongst many of you. (At iVillage, of course). You will always be a part of my time with Becky and I love you all more for that.
Love & HUgs, 
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: Pink Feathers

Posts.Content:
Just to refresh your memory. The PCE took off Friday night after hearing that Dear Becky was in the hospital to have a blood transfussion. You all flew to Louisville picked me up (Sara D you were there too) and we headed straight to the hosptial. Becky was sleeping soundly (after meds they gave her) We gave her tender kisses on the forehead and left a soft pink bunny for medicenal snuggling purposes.
We were all pretty tired so if you don't really remenber it I am here with all the details.
When I told her all this she giggled and dozed back to sleep.
Mike says she is sleeping alot. But when I talked to her today she seemed much more alert than she had a few days ago.
We love you all. It is great to be able to remind her she has so many of us with her.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
PS I started back to work this week. I hate not being able to drop everything and run when she asks .But I will not complain.
Posts.Title: Attention PCE

Posts.Content:
Becky was at church on Easter. Everyone was so happy to see her. We sat and waited for everyone to come by to say how happy they were to see her. She has so much love around her. She wasn't happy about having to use the wheel chair but she isn't real steady on her feet. It pretty much wiped her out for the evening but she is doing well today.
My little Ashley is having the lump removed on Wed. I didn't tell her Dad but everything they told them was exactly what they told me. "Nothing to worry about." "Let's just get it out." Then I woke up to the dreaded "C" Word. I don't think I'll breath til I hear from them on Wed nite and everything IS OK.
Asking for continued prayers.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
PS Mikki, Thanks for the feather. I still refuse to pick up the ones from Amelia's boa. I just let them wander around my house and when I see one I smile.
Posts.Title: Update on Becky and Ashley

Posts.Content:
Happy Birthday from one Louisville girl to another. Hope it was a great day.
Love & HUgs, 
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: Have we missed a birthday? Sdearing??

Posts.Content:
Dear Cathi,
Hugs & prayers comming your way.
Sorry you are having such a hard time. I found that when mouth sores started that my white count would be low. I would start nuepegen shots and about the time the back pain started the mouth sores would start to ease. Don't know if it was coincidence or real medical fact but it seemed that way. Might be worth checking into.
Love, Prayers & Hugs,
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: The dreaded mouth sores....YUCK

Posts.Content:
If anyone wants to send a message to Becky's family post it here and I will print them and make sure Mike gets them.
You are all more wonderful than words can say.
Love & Hugs, Angela
Posts.Title: Messgaes to Becky's Family

Posts.Content:
Mike says she is sleeping alot these days. Her balance is not good at all. She has fallen a couple of times. Fortunately, she hasn't hurt herself. I hope to talk to her later this afternoon. Again I am feeling useless. 
 I thank you all for the words of encouragement. I know that Becky doesn''t feel neglected. It's more the idea that there isn't enough in the world that anyone can do that makes this so hard. I try to remind myself that no matter what I am feeling Mike and the kids are going through so much more. 
Thanks again for letting me vent. There are very few people who understand why I feel this way.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
Posts.Title: Continued Prayers for Becky...

Posts.Content:
I have been thinking of you all day. I wasn't able to go with Becky today for a cat scan and I really felt like I was lettiong her down. (She didn't feel that way but I did) There is so little that I can do. No amount of time feels like enough. 
Becky and her family went to The Newport Aquairium lasts weekend. They had a great time but it took it's toll. She was exhausted and having some trouble with her balance on Mon. Today is better. She will get scan results on Thursday. If eeverything goes as planned she will start another chemo next week.
I know that you all keep us all in your prayers and it is so much appreciated. It is so comforting to know you are here at anytime.
You are all in my prayers as always.
Love and hugs,
Angela
Posts.Title: Hi Ladies, I felt the need to be here tonight....

Posts.Content:
Thanks Ladies,
You are all the greatest. I love you and am so greatfull for finding you. If I hadn't found you all I wouldn't have found Becky. What a Blessing you all have been.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: Hi Ladies, I felt the need to be here tonight....

Posts.Content:
I really have gotten addicted too. The little girl from NC has touched me. I grew up in SC and she reminds me of a cousin of mine. I have to say the new bc house memeber is interesting and hard at the same time. They really do help people deal with their own individual problems. It would have been great to have a life coach and councelor back when I was going through treatment and the aftermath. I was lucky I found you all not long after treamtment. I couldn't have made it without you.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: "Starting Over"

Posts.Content:
Hang in there. There is yet another day. If today was hard tomorrow will be better.
 How is that for a lift?
 I do sometimes think we have to have blue days to appreciate the better ones. Try to do something nice for yourself. A relaxing bath or a little time with a good book. That helps. Know you are loved and we all know how easy it is to get down. We just can't stay down.
Love & Hugs,
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone

Posts.Content:
Hey Girls,
Refresh my memory. What does the "C" stand for in PCE?
Love and Hugs,
Angela
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.

Posts.Title: PCE loading up for Cathi!

Posts.Content:
Ladies,
I had a call from my best friend in Louisiana. She is like a sister and was one of my lifelines through my dx & treatment . Her children are as much mine as hers. Her 14 year old daughter found a lump last week. They went to the dr. she sent them for an ultrasound. They were not satisfied with that so now she is going for a BIOPSY. She is 14 ! 
They see the surgeon Ties. to determine if they will do a needle or core biopsy.
I am watching Becky and all she is going through and I am about to lose it if my angel girl has to go through any part of this horrible hateful disease. 
Her mom held my hand and kept telling me I was going to be fine as her father was dying of lung cancer. She took care of my children when I was too sick to do it myself and reassured them that mommy was just feeling bad. Now I am 700 miles away and can't put my arms around her and tell her that her baby will be ok.
This whole thing really sucks, big time.
I am sorry I feel liike everytime I come here I am letting loose on you all but I know that no one else gets it.
I am starting to feel like everywhere I turn this disease is surrounding me.
Thanks for letting me vent.
Please remember my angel in your prayers. Her name is Ashley.
Love & HUgs,
Angela
PS That quote I use as my signature includes Ashley. She and her brother Ian are my children too.
Making the decision to have a child - it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking outside your body.
Elizabeth Stone
Posts.Title: Asking for Special Prayers

Posts.Content: There really isn't any new news on Becky. She is doing radiation every day during the week. She has started the steroids and they make her feel not quite herself.
Posts.Title: No news is good news on Becky
Continued Prayers for Becky...
Continued Prayers for Becky...

Posts.Content:
Oh MK, She recieved your card yesterday while I was there. We opened it together. Yours made 102 Birthday cards.
Isn't that awsome.
Angela
Posts.Title: Many Thanks from Becky

Posts.Content: Welcome,
Posts.Title: Newly Diagnosed
Prayers for Becky for good MRI results tomorrow

Posts.Content:
We are watching too. DH works as an engineer for local public radio. Los Lonely Boys played at his station when they really were Lonely 
I was rather proud of Melissa. She looks and sounds great.
Angela
Posts.Title: Melissa Etheridge- appearing bald & beautiful!

Posts.Content:
Becky's Birthday was so lovely. We had a spur of the moment celebration yesterday at lunchtime. Mike's sister and two sisters-in-law, a church friend and myself had lunch and laughs. Mike's Dad and Step Mom came by later and brought (guess what!) cake and icecream. Just before the kids came home she went up for a rest. She and Mike had dinner out plans. There were Birthday cards that ran accross her entertainment center, accross the bookcase to the left of the fireplace, accross the mantel and accross the bookcast to the right of the fireplace. AND there was a stack 3 inches thick that came in the mail yesterday. She has received at least 10 flower arrangements.
Becky asked that I thank you all so very much for all your thoughts prayers and birthday wishes. We think of you all so often. You are never far from our thoughts. With everything Becky has going right now it is hard to get the time to sit down at the computer. So this is one thing I CAN do for her out of so much that I can't.
So Thanks again for being here and doing what you all do best, love, listen and support.
Hugs and love to all,
Angela
Posts.Title: Many Thanks from Becky

Posts.Content:
Jenny,
It is so great to hear good news. We don't get enough of that here.
Hugs, and congratulations,
Angela
Posts.Title: Results are IN!
I just realized Sara posted about my surgery
Happy New Year

Posts.Content: Angela, 45, now Louisville, KY formerly Louisiana & SC. NED for 6 years as of May 14, 2004
